labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: The amount of gray placeholders is equivalent (or close) to the amount of members in the guild
data.expected_result: The amount of gray placeholders is equivalent (or at least close) to how many people can access that channel
data.short_description: The amount of gray placeholders in members list of a channel where not everyone can read is the amount of members in the guild [Lazy Guild Issue]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an unloaded lazy guild where you have a private channel - The smaller amount of people who can access that channel the better - Open up that channel - Open up its member list - Scroll down the placeholders quickly
